name: Stormterror
desc:
One of The Four Winds of Mondstadt: Dvalin, the Dragon of the East.
With the passage of long years and amid boundless darkness, even the purest gem will become dulled by dust, and even the noble dragon might be corrupted and cankered by hatred.
But never forget that dust can be wiped away, and the power of doubt and poison can be shattered.

"Fly freely in the sky.
"Just like you did in those days when we met, when I walked upon this land and sang the songs of the wind,
"And you soared on high, looking down on the world from above.
"Today, the sky is no longer swept by wind and snow. The green grass grows all over the earth, and it is beautiful.
"If you too could walk the earth and listen to the songs of shepherds and the scattered sound of wind chimes in the distance, if you could have tasted wine as sweet as honey, you would understand.
"How wonderful it would have been if you were as I, witnessing your noble, beautiful form as you soared through the blue sky.
"Then you would know that this sky and this earth are both things worth fighting for."

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Riders of the Wind, Onward</color>
Album: City of Winds and Idylls
Track: 61

<color=#ffd780>Caelestinum Finale Termini</color>
Album: The Wind and The Star Traveler
Track: 05

dropMaterial.name: Mora
dropMaterial.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

dropMaterial.name: Dream Solvent
dropMaterial.desc:
An item capable of changing Character Level-Up Materials obtained from memories and trials into whatever form is needed.
People once believed that spirits and memories had some material form. If someone dreamed of heaven before waking up clutching a flower, then that blossom must have been made from such a fantasy. Dream Solvent dissolves that which is obtained from memory and transforms it into some other dream.
Indeed, blows traded with the strong are stepping stones towards becoming stronger yourself.

dropMaterial.name: Northlander Bow Billet
dropMaterial.desc:
Weapon forging material. Can be used to forge 4-star bows.
Philosophers believe marble has the potential to be sculpted into a beautiful statue. Likewise, these billets have the potential to become something greater.

dropMaterial.name: Northlander Catalyst Billet
dropMaterial.desc:
Weapon forging material. Can be used to forge 4-star catalysts.
Philosophers believe marble has the potential to be sculpted into a beautiful statue. Likewise, these billets have the potential to become something greater.

dropMaterial.name: Northlander Claymore Billet
dropMaterial.desc:
Weapon forging material. Can be used to forge 4-star claymores.
Philosophers believe marble has the potential to be sculpted into a beautiful statue. Likewise, these billets have the potential to become something greater.

dropMaterial.name: Northlander Polearm Billet
dropMaterial.desc:
Weapon forging material. Can be used to forge 4-star polearms.
Philosophers believe marble has the potential to be sculpted into a beautiful statue. Likewise, these billets have the potential to become something greater.

dropMaterial.name: Northlander Sword Billet
dropMaterial.desc:
Weapon forging material. Can be used to forge 4-star swords.
Philosophers believe marble has the potential to be sculpted into a beautiful statue. Likewise, these billets have the potential to become something greater.

dropMaterial.name: Dvalin's Plume
dropMaterial.desc:
A feather from the tail of the Dragon of the East.
As a dragon's feather it has experienced more than a thousand years' worth of winds. One senses within it a yearning for freedom so strong that it could whip up a light breeze to rescue it from its current confines. Its former owner's recognition of you is what makes it content to stay in your hands.

dropMaterial.name: Dvalin's Claw
dropMaterial.desc:
A claw from the Dragon of the East.
It once contained the shadow dragon Durin's vile poison, having torn through the latter's flesh in battle. Thanks to your purification and healing, it is no longer toxic.

dropMaterial.name: Dvalin's Sigh
dropMaterial.desc:
A bit of power taken from the whirlwinds evoked by the Dragon of the East.
Beautiful and transparent, both trade winds and tornadoes will work in his name. The winds move as his companion, his voice, and his freedom.
His enemies are the thousands who stand against the wind.

dropMaterial.name: Vayuda Turquoise Sliver
dropMaterial.desc: Character Ascension Material.

dropMaterial.name: Vayuda Turquoise Fragment
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"Still, the winds change direction."

dropMaterial.name: Vayuda Turquoise Chunk
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"Still, the winds change direction.
Someday, they will blow towards a brighter future..."

dropMaterial.name: Vayuda Turquoise Gemstone
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"Still, the winds change direction.
"Someday, they will blow towards a brighter future...
"Take my blessings and live leisurely from this day onward."

dropMaterial.name: Vajrada Amethyst Sliver
dropMaterial.desc: Character Ascension Material.

dropMaterial.name: Vajrada Amethyst Fragment
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"This body is the noblest and most eminent of all in this world."

dropMaterial.name: Vajrada Amethyst Chunk
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"This body is the noblest and most eminent of all in this world.
It should hold absolute control over this world."

dropMaterial.name: Vajrada Amethyst Gemstone
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"This body is the noblest and most eminent of all in this world.
"It should hold absolute control over this world.
"It once promised its people a dream: the never-changing 'eternity.'"

dropMaterial.name: Varunada Lazurite Sliver
dropMaterial.desc: Character Ascension Material.

dropMaterial.name: Varunada Lazurite Fragment
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"My ideals have no stains."

dropMaterial.name: Varunada Lazurite Chunk
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"My ideals have no stains.
I must correct you. People here bear no sins in the eyes of the gods..."

dropMaterial.name: Varunada Lazurite Gemstone
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"My ideals have no stains.
I must correct you. People here bear no sins in the eyes of the gods... Only laws and the Tribunal can judge someone.
They can judge even me. So praise my magnificence and purity."

value.name: Dvalin
value.desc: An Elemental Dragon and the Anemo Archon Barbatos's friend. After being poisoned by the Shadow Dragon's blood, he became known as Stormterror.

value.name: Dvalin
value.desc:
"Dragon of the East" Dvalin

"How wonderful it would have been if you were as I, witnessing your noble, beautiful form as you soared through the blue sky."

"Then you would know that this sky and this earth are both things worth fighting for."
